```{r}
#| echo: false

library(downloadthis)

mtcars %>%
  download_this(
    output_name = "mtcars data set",
    output_extension = ".csv",
    button_label = "mtcars.csv",
    button_type = "default",
    has_icon = TRUE,
    icon = "fa fa-file-csv"
  )
```
